dialogue.text: Gabriel. Eloise. It’s a pleasure to see you. I wish it could’ve been for different circumstances.
That won’t work on me. Word gets around, you know? Does your daughter know about your past?
And your “valiant, selfless” decision to leave Notre Monde for a “better life” for her? A shame how that turned out.

dialogue.speaker: Colette
dialogue.text: Mom and Dad were in Notre Monde... and they left... for me?
Elliot, Alain, search the house for the child.

dialogue.speaker: Dad
dialogue.text: You’ll have to get through us, first!
You seem to have misunderstood. You are outnumbered here. There’s no escape now. It’s over.!

dialogue.speaker: Colette
dialogue.text: Come and get me-! I’m right here... huh?
